data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Lorient.
Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half?
Lorient's Adrian Grbic breaks free at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 6, Florent Batta awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 14, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Lorient.
Goal! Saint-Etienne have got their heads in front thanks to a Romain Hamouma strike.
Great play from Arnaud Nordin to set up the goal.
In the minute 27, Yvan Neyou (Saint-Etienne) has received a yellow card from Florent Batta.
Enzo Le Fee (Lorient) gets a yellow card.
Lorient are whistled for offside.
In the minute 42, Florent Batta signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Lorient's half.
Adrian Grbic (Lorient) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick Lorient.
In the minute 43, Florent Batta signals a throw-in for Lorient, close to Saint-Etienne's area.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Saint-Etienne's Adil Aouchiche is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Florent Batta awards the home team a throw-in.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Lorient have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 48, Lorient have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
In the minute 51, It's a goal kick for the away team in Saint Etienne.
Goal! Romain Hamouma extends Saint-Etienne's lead to 2-0.
Arnaud Nordin instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 53, Florent Batta signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Lorient's half.
Arnaud Nordin for Saint-Etienne drives towards goal at Stade Geoffroy Guichard. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 55, Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Saint-Etienne to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
Arnaud Nordin (Saint-Etienne) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Saint-Etienne.
In Saint Etienne, Mathieu Debuchy (Saint-Etienne) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
In the minute 58, The away team replace Adrian Grbic with Umut Bozok.
The away team have replaced Enzo Le Fee with Pierre-Yves Hamel. This is the second substitution made today by Christophe Pelissier.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Lorient.
Saint-Etienne drive upfield and Adil Aouchiche gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lorient defender.
In the minute 62, Lorient have a goal kick.
In Saint Etienne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Florent Batta awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in the half of Lorient.
In the minute 64, Free kick Saint-Etienne.
Corner awarded to Lorient.
Goal kick for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Lorient at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Throw-in high up the field for Saint-Etienne in Saint Etienne.
Lorient needs to be cautious. Saint-Etienne have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 68, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Free kick for Saint-Etienne in the half of Lorient.
Throw-in Lorient.
In the minute 69, Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Saint-Etienne awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Throw-in Lorient.
Claude Puel is making the team's first substitution at Stade Geoffroy Guichard with Yann M`Vila replacing Denis Bouanga.
Saint-Etienne make their second substitution with Maxence Rivera replacing Yvan Neyou.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Saint-Etienne territory.
In the minute 72, Kevin Monnet-Paquet is on a sub for Romain Hamouma for Saint-Etienne.
Lorient are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 73, Throw-in for Lorient close to the penalty box.
Can Lorient capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Lorient in Saint Etienne.
In the minute 74, Stephane Diarra is replacing Yoane Wissa for Lorient at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Saint-Etienne in their own half.
In the minute 76, Saint-Etienne needs to be cautious. Lorient have an attacking throw-in.
Can Saint-Etienne get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
In Saint Etienne Lorient drive forward through Stephane Diarra. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 78, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Lorient.
Wesley Fofana (Saint-Etienne) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Florent Batta awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 81, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Claude Puel (Saint-Etienne) is making a fourth substitution, with Jean-Philippe Krasso replacing Arnaud Nordin.
Free kick Lorient.
In the minute 84, Can Lorient capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Saint-Etienne's half?
Florent Batta signals a Lorient throw-in in Saint-Etienne's half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne at Stade Geoffroy Guichard.
In the minute 86, Lorient's Laurent Abergel gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Florent Batta awards Saint-Etienne a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Saint-Etienne.
Sylvain Marveaux is replacing Fabien Lemoine for the away team.
Ball safe as Saint-Etienne is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a Saint-Etienne goal kick.
Saint-Etienne's Yvann Macon is back in action after a slight knock.
Florent Batta will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Florent Batta signals a Saint-Etienne throw-in in Lorient's half.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Throw-in for Saint-Etienne in their own half.
Lorient have a dangerous throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Saint Etienne to check on Yvann Macon, who is grimacing with pain.
It seems as if Yvann Macon is unable to continue. Assane Diousse replaces him for the home team.
